title: BLACK_XP_10_DUAL_LAYER_BUILD(Modified_By_Dak).iso
description:

This is BLACK_XP_10_DUAL_LAYER_BUILD modified to fit on DVD

This torrent was originally done by: Old.Bombadillo

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have burn tested this ISO to insure that it will fit on a single layer 4.7 GB DVD, but I have not yet installed it on my PC. Therefore I can\&#039;t attest to its reliability, but based on comments from others who downloaded it prior to me modifying it, it\&#039;s install.............

If so, give all the credit to Old.Bombadillo, after all, he did do all the work!!
